author: robyn376
title: Basic hotel with lovely staff in a good location. However unreliable hot water.
text: The location was excellent ,close to Gard du Nord,metro,Montmartre,moulin rouge and plenty of cafes,bars etc. staff were just lovely. Our room was comfortable enough and was what we expected given the rating and the price. Only real downside was the unreliable hot water. It took forever to heat up or it wouldn't heat up at all or would go stone cold during your shower.
